long_description: Designed to keep your lunch fresh, the medium-size REI Coolbox Personal Cooler features an ultrathin profile that makes it easy to slip into a pack or bag. Closed-cell foam provides efficient insulation to keep food and beverages cool for hours. Heavy-duty PEVA liner is waterproof, PVC-free and easy to wipe clean. The Medium REI Coolbox Personal Cooler has an outer zip pocket for utensils and napkins.
short_description: Designed to keep your lunch fresh, the medium-size REI Coolbox Personal Cooler features an ultrathin profile that makes it easy to slip into a pack or bag.
